title: Tom Brady, Dee Ford, overtime rule, and Russell Westbrook
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Dee Ford, overtime rule, and Russell Westbrook
description:
Colin explains why New England Patriots QB Tom Brady shouldn't retire, the ramifications of Kansas City Chiefs LB Dee Ford's mental error, why the NFL overtime rule shouldn't be changed, and why the Oklahoma City Thunder is no longer Russell Westbrook's team. Guests include Nick Wright, Eric Mangini, Chris Simms, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
